Comment: ***From Rolling Stone’s Nikki McCann Ramirez and Andrew Perez:***  Another federal judge has blocked the Trump administration’s efforts to deport migrants under the Alien Enemies Act, at least for now.  Judge Charlotte Sweeney, of the Colorado District Court, ruled on Tuesday that the White House could not order the removal of migrants held in Colorado detention centers under the Alien Enemies Act (AEA), an 18th century wartime law that President Donald Trump is exploiting in order to remove undocumented migrants from the United States. Trump asserts he can use the law to deport people, without due process, by declaring them to be members of gangs he’s deemed terrorist organizations.
